attributes.action: Request the FA reduce the amount of foriegn players within British leagues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following Trevor Brooking's findings and a noticeable lack of British players available to England, N.Ireland, Scotland & Wales The F.A. should be asked to reduce the amount of Foreign players a team is allowed to sign, and the amount allowed on pitch.

This will mean that money from transfers will bolster British league teams finances, Help with training and youth teams.

May help bring football back as a national sport and the nation will back it.
